channel.title: "The Anatomy Of Melancholy" (1621) by Robert Burton in XeLaTeX
channel.description: A free/libre project to create a new modern edition for 'Anatomy of Melancholy'.

item.title: Latest draft url
item.description: The latest published draft can be accessed from the url https://epilys.github.io/anatomy-of-melancholy-latex/aom_latest.pdf
